title.rendered: Winning Time: The Rise of the Lakers Dynasty

content.rendered:
Directed by Salli Richardson-Whitfield. Tanya Hamilton. Payman Benz. Damian Marcano. Jonah Hill. Adam McKay. Todd Banhazl. Trey Edward Shults.

Written by Max Borenstein. Max Borenstein. Max Borenstein. Max Borenstein. Max Borenstein. Jeff Pearlman. Rodney Barnes. Rodney Barnes. Jim Hecht. Jim Hecht. Jim Hecht. Benjamin/ep Klein. Rebecca Bertuch. Rebecca Bertuch.

Cast  Quincy Isaiah( Magic Johnson 1) . Jason Clarke( Jerry West 1) . Gaby Hoffmann( Claire Rothman 1) . Hadley Robinson( Jeanie Buss 1) . DeVaughn Nixon( Norm Nixon 1) . Solomon Hughes( Kareem Abdul-Jabbar 1) . Tamera Tomakili( Cookie Keely 1) . Brett Cullen( Bill Sharman 1) . Stephen Adly Guirgis( Frank Mariani 1) . Spencer Garrett( Chick Hearn 1) . Sarah Ramos( Cheryl Pistono 1) . Molly Gordon( Linda Zafrani 1) . Joey Brooks( Lon Rosen 1) . Rob Morgan( Earvin Johnson Sr. 1) . Austin Aaron( Mark Landsberger 1) . Newton Mayenge( Jim Chones 1) . Sally Field( Jessie Buss ) . McCabe Slye( Jimmy Buss ) . Adrien Brody( Pat Riley ) . Tracy Letts( Jack McKinney ) . Jimel Atkins( Jamaal Wilkes ) . Louis Riviere( Sports Journalist ) . Jason Segel( Paul Westhead ) . Julianne Nicholson( Cranny McKinney ) . Delante Desouza( Michael Cooper ) . Jon Young( Brad Holland ) . Rickey Eugene Brown( Quincy Johnson ) . Darone Okolie( Larry Johnson ) . Andy Hirsch( David Stern ) . Nicholas Wagner( Sports Journalist ) . Wood Harris( Spencer Haywood ) . Michael Boucher( Jack Curran ) . Timothy E. Goodwin( Reporter #4 ) . Allen Marsh( Lou Adler ) . Larry Fields( Eddie Jordan ) . Michael Chiklis( Red Auerbach ) . LisaGay Hamilton( Christine Johnson ) . Sean Patrick Small( Larry Bird ) . Nell T. Sherman( Maude ) . Shelby Moats( Marty Byrnes ) . Carina Conti( Paula Adbul ) . Rodney Barnes( Maurice ) . Cayden K. Williams( 8-Year-Old Earvin ) . Kayla Radomski( Laker Girl ) . Jessica Hiestand( Laker Girl ) . Brooklyn Benson( Laker Girl ) . Christopher Matthew Spencer( Courtside Photographer ) . Emma LaPlante( Laker Girl ) . Joseph Kuo( Alan Hardy ) . David Purdham( Larry O’Brien ) . Michael AG Scott( Butch Lee ) . Robyn S. Clark( Edna ) . David Bowe( Sports Reporter ) . Max E. Williams( Jack Nicholson ) . Annelisha Dixon( Yvonne Johnson ) . Bailey Swift( Laker Girl ) . Mike Boorn( Brad Holland ) . Tor’i Brooks( David Thompson ) . Karl Chaffey( Sports Journalist ) . Kate Arrington( JoAnn Mueller ) . Gillian Jacobs( Chris Riley ) . Rachel Hilson( Cindy Day ) . Terence Davis( Adrian Dantley ) . Donnell Rawlings( Mr. Earl ) . Ian Boyd( Leon Riley ) . Eric Nenninger( Keith Erickson ) . John Black( Scout ) . Scott Subiono( Sports Reporter ) . John Dellaporta( Brent Musberger ) . Chris Doubek( Sports Reporter ) . Jonnathon Cripple( Scout ) . Steve Hartman( Sport Radio Broadcaster ) . Dave Pingalone( Sport Radio Broadcaster ) . Kirk Bovill( Donald Sterling ) . David Moskowitz( Lakers Fan ) . Caitlin O’Connor( Dyan Cannon ) . Anna Dahl( Michelle ) . Tiege Dooley-Panko( Laker Girl #4 ) . Sloane Wilson( Laker Girl ) . Bradley Duane Phillips( Studio Head, VIP Celebrity ) . Malcolm Walters( Butch Carter ) . Trey Bender( Gary Bender ) . Lola Kirke( Karen Bua West ) . Rory Cochrane( Jerry Tarkanian ) . Steve Harris( Dr. Thomas Day ) . James Lesure( Julius Erving ) . Susan Pourfar( Cassie Westhead ) . Ta’Nika Gibson( Debbie Allen ) . Nancy Lantis( Gail ) . Eddie Pepitone( Mr. Melvin ) . Adam Zastrow( Gary the Greek ) . Earthquake( Mr. Leroy ) . Chelsea M. Davis( Rhonda Mitchell ) . Melissa Bickerton( Lois Tarkanian ) . Mariama Diallo( Iman ) . Gina Torrecilla( Rose Weiss ) . Edward Fletcher( Sportswriter ) . Kenneth Meseroll( Owner ) . Ted Enberg( Dick Enberg ) . Patrick Day( Owner ) . Troy Vincent( Owner ) . Carey Scott( Dr. Kerlan ) . Jack Michael Doke( Dennis McKinney ) . Meggie Cherilus( Party Girl ) . Austin Moseley( John McKinney ) . Kiara Muhammad( Evelyn Johnson ) . Jayne Entwistle( Mary Lou Lieblich ) . Charissa Kroeger( Laker Girl ) . G. Larry Butler( Johnny Most ) . Noelle Marsh( Laker Girl ) . Christopher Gehrman( Bill Fitch ) . Mel Fair( Hot Rod Hundley ) . Jasmin/epe Mason( Laker Girl ) . Christien Heath( Lead Official ) . Thomas Mann( Johnny Buss ) . Vincent Lionetti( Angelo Drossos ) . Donum Dei( Journalist ) . McKenna Ralston( Raiderette ) . Martyn Hale( Rowdy Laker Fan ) . Kaleti Williams( Wally Rank ) . Anna Sundquist( Skylar ) . Casey Bradley( Anna Gerhardt ) . Michael O’Keefe( Jack Kent Cooke ) . Carter Redwood( Brian ) . Lucy Walters( Beverly )

Language English.

Producers Rodney Barnes. Rebecca Bertuch. Max Borenstein. Hank Corwin. Jim Hecht. Sarah Khan. Adam McKay. Kevin J. Messick. Jason Shuman. Scott Stephens. Timothy Stormer. Maeve Cullinane. Bruce Dunn. Peter Feldman. Jason Ramos. Gala Goliani. Domin/epique Diaz.

Production Home Box Office (HBO). Hyperobject Industries.

Status OnGoing (2022–)
